content: 8 chain-1 potty little pansy copyright 2025 lettice rose round 7 starting in a corner 3trcl use a starting double_crochet as the first double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in chain space skip cluster x 4 2 half_double_crochet in chain space x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off 4 double_crochet 10 half_double_crochet per side round 8 with yarn a starting in a corner with a standing stitch 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet bphdc around each of next 14 st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join finish off 14 bphdc 4 half_double_crochet chain-2 per side this would be a good place to adjust for size using double_crochet or single_crochet if necessary round 9 with yarn d starting in a corner with a standing stitch single_crochet chain 2 single_crochet skip 1st hidden st single_crochet in each of next 17 st x 4 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to join finish off 19 single_crochet chain-2 per side sew in all ends block should you feel necessary chart of central 3 rounds many thanks to jacqui goulbourn tiggerbee for kindly providing the chart potty little pansy copyright 2025 lettice rose round by round photos rounds 1-3 round 4 wrong side view round 5 wrong side view potty little pansy copyright 2025 lettice rose round 6 round 7 round 8 potty little pansy copyright 2025 lettice rose
